text: Eden Star (stylized as EDEN STAR) is an action-adventure survival video game developed and published by Flix Interactive. It was released into early access on 30 January 2015 for Microsoft Windows and is currently in Steam's early access program. ==References== Category:Upcoming video games Category:Early access video games Category:Windows games Category:Windows-only games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Survival video games Category:Unreal Engine games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Video games developed in the United Kingdom
title: Eden Star
